name: point-system-monorepo
description: Point System Monorepo with NestJS backend and Next.js frontends

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:user"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@point-system/backend
scripts.build:admin: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@point-system/admin
scripts.build:user: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@point-system/user
